manipulation_analysis.explanation: The man on the right looks like he was pasted into the picture from somewhere else. His body looks too big compared to the man on the left, like a giant standing next to a normal person. It's like he's wearing shoes that are too big.

inferred_original_state.description: The man on the right would be shorter and more in proportion to the man on the left, so they would look like they belong in the same picture.

inverse_edit_instructions.Effect: Rescale the man on the right to match his original proportions.
Explanation: Reduce the size of the man on the right to match the scale of the man on the left.
